segments.text: Excuse me . Is flight KL638 late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so.Flight KL638 is still at the airport due to the hurricane .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my god . If this flight is late . I will for Sydney.What can I do now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well if so.you should contact with the office over there.Maybe they will do you some help .
segments.speaker: S2
